Source: vignettes/not-built-vignettes/error_demo.Rmd
error_demo.Rmd

\[ Y = X\beta + \epsilon \]

library(plotly)

fig <- plot_ly() %>%
  add_trace(x = c(1,0,0),
            y = c(0,1,0),
            z = c(0,0,1),
            facecolor = "grey",
            opacity = .5,
            type = "mesh3d")

fig

\[ \hat{\beta} = (X^TX)^{-1}X^Ty \]
